subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Tim Wakefield gave up a two-run homer to Delmon Young yesterday, and Boston’s lead in the American League East shrank to one and a half games over the Yankees after the Red Sox lost to the Tampa Bay Devils Rays, 5-4.
snippet: Tim Wakefield gave up a two-run homer to Delmon Young yesterday, and Boston’s lead in the American League East shrank to one and a half games over the Yankees after the Red Sox lost to the Tampa Bay Devils Rays, 5-4.
